src:
Veliki test: 6 najbolj popularnih načinov za podaljšanje penisa
Trg je dobesedno zasut z nešteto različnimi produkti za povečanje dolžine in obsega moških spolnih udov. Ponujajo nam različne tablete, mazila, naravne sestavine in celo operacije.
06 Nov 2019, 07:16 by P. I.



FOTO: Internet



FOTO: Internet



Končna ocena gela Excite: 9,6/10 FOTO: Excite Power



Končna ocena tablet Male Extra: 5,6/10 FOTO: Male Extra



Končna ocena kirurške operacije: 7,0/10 FOTO: Internet



Končna ocena črpalke Penomet: 4,2/10 FOTO: Penomet



Končna ocena naprave Size Genetics: 7,2/10 FOTO: Size Genetics



Končna ocena obližev X-core: 9,7/10 FOTO: Xcore


Za vse načine trdijo, da učinkovito povečujejo moški ud ali pa vsaj pomagajo pri trših in večjih erekcijah. Znano je, da vsi izdelki za povečanje delujejo na enega od naslednjih načinov:1.    Pospešujejo dotok krvi v spolni ud in s tem telo po naravni poti poskrbi za večje in trše erekcije, dolgoročno pa lahko pride do povečanja tkiva. 2.    Fizično »raztegujejo« spolni ud in s tem poskrbijo, da se poveča.3.    Operacija ligamenta, ki povezuje gobasti del penisa z medenico, in s tem doseganje podaljšanja.Zato smo se odločili testirati 6 najbolj popularnih pripomočkov za povečanje penisa in tukaj so rezultati: 
1.    Tablete Male Extra


Končna ocena tablet Male Extra: 5,6/10 FOTO: Male Extra

Tablete Male Extra naj bi bile najbolj učinkovite tablete za povečanje penisa. Uporabniku ponujajo mešanico sedmih naravnih sestavin, ki povečajo dotok krvi v penis in s tem vplivajo na velikost, trdoto in trajnost erekcij. Majhne modre kapsule pogoltnete z nekaj požirki tekočine. Sestavine, ki jih tablete vsebujejo, so: L-arginin, 40 % kislina granatnega jabolka, MSM (methyl sulfonyl methane), L-methionine, cink, glavatec in niacin (vitamin B3).Kako delujejo: Vsak dan je treba ob jedi zaužiti 3 kapsule Male Extra. Te nato v vašem telesu sprostijo vse naštete sestavine, ki povečajo dotok krvi v vaš penis in dostavo kisika v celice ter povzročijo tršo erekcijo in večjo vzdržljivost. Učinkovitost: Uporabniki naj bi v 3–6 mesecih uporabe videli razliko od 2 do 6,6 cm, vendar nobena znanstvena raziskava tega ne potrjuje. Prav tako v Sloveniji nismo našli uporabnika, ki bi lahko potrdil kakršno koli učinkovitost. Stranski učinki: Čeprav proizvajalec trdi, da stranskih učinkov ni, po drugi strani pove, da je pred jemanjem tablet obvezno posvetovanje z osebnim zdravnikom. Gre za kapsulo, ki jo vnašate neposredno v svoje telo in ob zavračanju katere koli sestavine lahko telo reagira na neželen način. Možnost nakupa in cena: Tablete je preverjeno možno naročiti v Slovenijo na njihovi uradni spletni strani (klikni tukaj), cena 1 škatlice tablet pa je okoli 48,45 EUR.  
2.    Obliži X-core


Končna ocena obližev X-core: 9,7/10 FOTO: Xcore

Obliži X-core za povečanje penisa v svojem lepilu vsebujejo kar 18 aktivnih naravnih sestavin, kar je največ med vsemi izdelki, ki smo jih testirali. Gre za 30 obližev v škatlici, ki jih na 24 ur menjavate in tako vsaj en mesec telesu omogočate stalno in nadzorovano absorbiranje omenjenih sestavin. Sestavine, ki jih obliži vsebujejo, so: L-arginin, list koprive, kajenski poper, muira puama, izvleček orhideje, meso ostrige, Tribulus, cink, Sarsaparilla, opnasti grahovec, sladki koren, seme buče, bor, Pygueum, maca, vimček, oves in catuaba.Kako delujejo: Kot medicinski ali nikotinski obliži proti kajenju tudi X-core delujejo tako, da omogočajo telesu, da skozi kožo absorbira vse sestavine v lepilu obližev. Ko v telesu dosežemo zadostno količino sestavin, telo reagira s povečanjem pretoka krvi v spolni ud in rezultat so večje in trše erekcije, močnejši spolni libido, večja vzdržljivost in dolgoročno tudi povečanje spolnega uda. Učinkovitost: Uporabniki naj bi v 10 tednih dosegli povečanje tudi do 7,4 cm, povprečno pa rezultate vidijo med 3. in 4. tednom uporabe. V Sloveniji največ uporabnikov uporablja prav obliže X-core, za katere smo našli tudi največ pohval in največ uporabnikov, ki so potrdili njihovo učinkovitost. Stranski učinki: Ker gre za absorbiranje naravnih sestavin skozi kožo, je uporaba obližev X-core povsem varna. Če ste alergični na navadne obliže, lahko tudi tukaj med nošenjem opazite malce rdečkasto kožo, zato se priporoča, da se vsak dan obliž nosi na drugem delu telesa (en dan na levi roki, drug dan na desni).Možnost nakupa in cena: Obliže X-core je preverjeno možno naročiti na uradni slovenski spletni strani www.xcorepovecanje.com, omogočajo pa tudi slovensko pomoč ali naročila po telefonu na številki 031 401 302. Cena škatlice obližev je trenutno v akciji 39,99 EUR.  
3.    Naprava Size Genetics


Končna ocena naprave Size Genetics: 7,2/10 FOTO: Size Genetics

Size Genetics je naprava, ki s pomočjo pritiska posnema naprave za fitnes in omogoča rast spolnega uda. Gre za precej kompleksno napravo, ki se jo namesti direktno na spolni ud in pusti delovati (v prostem času, ne med spolnim odnosom).Kako deluje: Naprava Size Genetics se pritrdi na penis in povzroči nežno, a stalno raztezanje spolnega uda na območju, kjer se sicer zadržuje kri med erekcijo. Ta pritisk povzroči, da se celice začnejo cepiti in se tako kot pri obremenitvi drugih mišic na telesu začnejo hkrati tudi obnavljati in omogočati rast. Učinkovitost: Uporabniki so v nekaj mesecih pri vsakodnevni uporabi (dve do tri ure dnevno) opazili do 7 cm rasti, vendar so razlike zelo velike glede na začetno velikost spolnega uda. V Sloveniji ni znanih rezultatov uporabe, saj napravo uporabljajo predvsem v Združenih državah Amerike. Stranski učinki: Ker gre za fizičen poseg na občutljivem območju telesa, se je pred kakršno koli uporabo obvezno posvetovati z osebnim zdravnikom. Nestrokovna uporaba namreč lahko povzroči resne težave, tudi erektilno disfunkcijo. Možnost nakupa in cena: Napravo je preverjeno možno naročiti v Slovenijo (poštnina 19 EUR) na uradni spletni strani, cena osnovnega modela pa je 189,95 EUR oz. 279 EUR z vsemi dodatnimi pripomočki.  
4.    Gel za povečanje Excite


Končna ocena gela Excite: 9,6/10 FOTO: Excite Power

Gel za povečanje Excite je krema, ki s pomočjo posebne mešanice sestavin takoj po nanosu spodbudi hitrejši in učinkovitejši dotok večje količine krvi v moški spolni ud ter s tem poskrbi za veliko večje in trše erekcije. Gre za gel v steklenički, ki ima na vrhu pršilo za lažji nanos. Sestavine, ki jih vsebuje gel Excite, so: voda, hidroliziran kolagen, Caprylic-Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Sorbitol, PVP, Alcohol denat., Capsicum Frutescens (ekstrakt), Tocopheryl Acetate, skvalan, parafin, Glycereth-26, mentol, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Sodium Saccharin, Aroma, Phenoxyethanol, Methy-Ethyl-Propyl-Butylparaben, Acrylates/C 10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Benzyl alcohol, 2-Bromo-2-nitropropane-1, 3-diol, Triethanolamine, B.H.T., Tetrasodium EDTA, Carbomer. Kako deluje: 5–15 minut pred spolnim odnosom gel nežno nanesete na spolni ud in masirate, dokler se popolnoma ne absorbira. Po minuti ali dveh začne takoj delovati, saj sestavine poskrbijo za naglo spremembo temperature v spolnem udu in s tem na naraven način »prepričajo« telo, da vanj pošlje več krvi, kar se odraža v lažjem doseganju erekcij, ki so hkrati večje in trše. Učinkovitost: Je edini izdelek, pri katerem se rezultati vidijo že po prvem nanosu, zato je v prednosti pred drugimi izdelki, kjer je potrebna dolgotrajna uporaba. Slovenski uporabniki poročajo o vidnih spremembah, in sicer tudi do 5 cm v dolžino. V različnih medijih poročajo o gelu Excite kot najbolj učinkovitem izdelku za povečanje in izboljšanje erekcij. Stranski učinki: Stranski učinki niso zaznani, razen v primeru hude alergije na kakšno od sestavin, kar se lahko pozna v rahli rdečici na koži. Ker gre za zunanjo uporabo, je izdelek preverjeno varen in primeren za uporabo tudi brez posvetovanja z zdravnikom. Možnost nakupa in cena: Ker je na trgu veliko (manj učinkovitih) različic gela, je pomembno, da se nakup opravi na uradni strani za Slovenijo, in sicer www.ExcitePovecanje.com, ali na slovenski številki za naročila in informacije 031 401 302.  
5.    Vakuumska črpalka Penomet


Končna ocena črpalke Penomet: 4,2/10 FOTO: Penomet

Vakuumska črpalka Penomet je najbolj popularna vakuumska črpalka za povečanje penisa, ki s pomočjo ustvarjenega pritiska pomaga doseči erekcijo pred spolnim odnosom in poskrbi za večji spolni ud. Gre za črpalko, ki jo nataknete na spolni ud in s potiskom iz nje iztisnete zrak ter poskrbite za pritisk. Drugače kot druge vakuumske črpalke, ki delujejo le na zrak in zato ne poskrbijo za enakomerno rast, se pri črpalki Penomet svetuje uporaba v vodi, ki poskrbi, da je pritisk na vseh delih enak. Kako deluje: Na črpalko Penomet namestite snemljiv obroč, ki ustreza velikosti vašega spolnega uda. Pod tušem ali v kadi namestite pumpico na svoj spolni ud in nežno parkrat iz nje iztisnete zrak, da se ustvari pritisk. Čez nekaj časa popustite in ponovite postopek vsake nekaj minut v obdobju 15–20 minut. Na koncu je vaš penis v erekciji, ki je tudi večja in trša kot sicer.Učinkovitost: Nekateri uporabniki poročajo o povečavah tudi do 6 cm, drugi pa Penomet uporabljajo le za izboljšanje erekcij. Slovenski uporabniki imajo podobne izkušnje kot uporabniki v tujini – večini pomaga pri izboljšanju erekcije, nekaterim pa tudi pri povečanju spolnega uda.Stranski učinki: Tudi pri Penometu gre za fizični poseg, zato je treba delati po navodilih in se po možnosti posvetovati z osebnim zdravnikom, saj nepravilna uporaba lahko povzroči erektilno disfunkcijo. Možnost nakupa in cena: Napravo je preverjeno možno naročiti v Slovenijo na uradni spletni strani, a se zaračuna še dodatna cena dostave v višini 30 USD. Cena črpalke Penomet je 97 EUR v osnovni in 227 EUR v premium različici.  
6.    Kirurška povečava


Končna ocena kirurške operacije: 7,0/10 FOTO: Internet

Na voljo je več vrst kirurških posegov, s katerimi se lahko penis podaljša in poveča njegov volumen. Mi smo preverili najbolj popularen način povečave z rezanjem ligamenta.Kako deluje: Estetski kirurg prereže ligament, ki povezuje gobasti del penisa z medenico, in tako doseže podaljšanje. Volumen penisa se nato poveča z maščobnim tkivom, ki ga posrkajo iz pacientovega trebušnega dela okoli penisa.Učinkovitost: Penis lahko s takšnim posegom povečajo za 2 do 4 cm, posege pa opravljajo tudi v Sloveniji, kjer so rezultati enaki kot v tujini. Seveda pa se je treba za operacijo dogovoriti pri uradnih in preverjenih strokovnjakih. Stranski učinki: Neželeni možni učinki operacije so številni in vključujejo infekcije, poškodbe živcev, zmanjšano občutljivost in težave z erekcijo. Morda najbolj moteče in pogoste so brazgotine, ki se lahko pojavijo po operaciji. Neželeni učinki pri širjenju obsega pa so najpogosteje neraven in neenakomeren videz penisa.Možnost nakupa: Kirurške posege izvajajo različni estetski kirurgi, cena posega v Sloveniji pa je giblje med 1500 in 2000 EUR. 
Zaključna misel
Med vsemi naštetimi možnostmi povečave penisa smo našli tri očitne zmagovalce, saj smo v izboru upoštevali potencialni rezultat (učinkovitost), stranske učinke in končno ceno.Povečanje spolnega uda: obliži X-core, Size GeneticsIzboljšanje erekcij: Gel ExciteKer pa za Size Genetics ni na voljo dovolj mnenj uporabnikov, gredo naši glasovi obližem X-core in gelu Excite. Ta dva načina lahko pomagata pri izboljšanju erekcij in vplivata na velikost spolnega uda. 


FOTO: Internet

Moramo poudariti, da je treba vse izdelke uporabljati po navodilih in da se vsako telo drugače odzove, zato je treba spremljati rezultate. Vašemu znancu lahko en izdelek zelo pomaga, drugi pa sploh ne, a to ni jamstvo, da bo tako tudi pri vas. Pri vas je lahko prav nasprotno. Vsekakor pa lahko priporočamo, da najprej preizkusite izdelke, ki nimajo stranskih učinkov, saj gre navsezadnje za vaše telo in zdravje.
text:
The Big Test: The 6 Most Popular Ways to Extend Your Penis
The market is literally littered with a myriad of different products to increase the length and volume of men's sex limbs. They offer us various pills, ointments, natural ingredients and even surgeries.
06 Nov 2019, 07:16 by P.I.



PHOTO: Internet



PHOTO: Internet



Excite Final Gel Rating: 9.6 / 10 PHOTO: Excite Power



Final rating of Male Extra tablets: 5.6 / 10 PHOTO: Male Extra



Final evaluation of surgery: 7.0 / 10 PHOTO: Internet



Final Penomet pump rating: 4.2 / 10 PHOTO: Penomet



Final Genetics Rating: 7.2 / 10 PHOTO: Size Genetics



X-core patch final rating: 9.7 / 10 PHOTO: Xcore


In all ways, they claim to effectively enlarge the male limb, or at least help with harder and bigger erections. All enhancement products are known to work in one of the following ways: 1. They accelerate blood flow to the penis, thereby naturally providing the body with larger and harder erections, and in the long run, tissue enlargement can occur. 2. Physically "stretch" the penis and thereby increase it.3. Ligament surgery that connects the spongy part of the penis to the pelvis, thereby achieving extension. So we decided to test the 6 most popular penis enlargement aids and here are the results:
1. Male Extra Pills


Final rating of Male Extra tablets: 5.6 / 10 PHOTO: Male Extra

Male Extra tablets are said to be the most effective penis enlargement pills. They offer the user a mixture of seven natural ingredients that increase blood flow to the penis and thus affect the size, hardness and durability of erections. Swallow the small blue capsules with a few sips of liquid. The ingredients that the tablets contain are: L-arginine, 40% pomegranate acid, MSM (methyl sulfonyl methane), L-methionine, zinc, comb and niacin (vitamin B3) .How they work: Eat every day at meal 3 capsules Male Extra. These then release into your body all of the above ingredients, which increase blood flow to your penis and oxygen delivery to your cells and cause stiffer erection and increased endurance. Efficiency: Users should see a difference of 2 to 6.6 cm within 3-6 months of use, but no scientific research has confirmed this. Also, we have not found a user in Slovenia who can confirm any performance. Side effects: Although the manufacturer claims that there are no side effects, on the other hand, he states that it is mandatory to consult a doctor before taking the tablets. It is a capsule that you inject directly into your body and when discarded with any of the ingredients, the body can react in an undesirable way. Possibility of purchase and price: The tablets can be verified orderable in Slovenia on their official website (click here), and the price of 1 tablet of tablets is around 48,45 EUR.
2. X-core patches


X-core patch final rating: 9.7 / 10 PHOTO: Xcore

X-core penis enlargement patches contain as many as 18 active natural ingredients in their adhesive, which is the highest of all products tested. These are 30 patches in a box that are changed every 24 hours to allow the body to absorb these ingredients at a steady and controlled rate for at least one month. The ingredients the patches contain are: L-arginine, nettle leaf, cayenne pepper, muira puama, orchid extract, oyster meat, tribulus, zinc, Sarsaparilla, foamy peas, licorice, pumpkin seeds, pine, Pygueum, pussy, yam , oats and catuaba.How they work: Like medical or nicotine anti-smoking patches, X-core also works by allowing the body to absorb all the ingredients in the adhesive of the patches through the skin. When a sufficient amount of ingredients are obtained in the body, the body reacts by increasing the blood flow to the penis, resulting in larger and harder erections, stronger sexual libido, greater endurance and, in the long term, an increase in the penis. Efficiency: Users are expected to reach a magnification of up to 7.4 cm in 10 weeks, with an average of seeing results between weeks 3 and 4. The most X-core patches in Slovenia are X-core patches, for which we have found the most praise and the highest number of users who have confirmed their effectiveness. Side Effects: Because it's all about absorbing natural ingredients through the skin, using X-core patches is completely safe. If you are allergic to regular patches, you may also notice a little reddish skin while wearing it, so it is recommended that the patch be worn on a different part of the body every day (one day on the left arm, another day on the right). The X-core can be verified by ordering on the official Slovenian website www.xcorepovecanje.com, as well as providing Slovenian assistance or orders by phone at 031 401 302. The price of the patch box is currently in action 39,99 EUR.
3. Size Genetics device


Final Genetics Rating: 7.2 / 10 PHOTO: Size Genetics

Size Genetics is a device that imitates fitness devices with the help of pressure and enables the growth of the penis. It is a rather complex device that can be placed directly on the penis and left to work (during leisure time, not during intercourse). How it works: The Size Genetics device attaches to the penis and causes a gentle but constant stretching of the penis in the area, where otherwise blood is retained during an erection. This pressure causes the cells to start to cleave and, as with the load on other muscles in the body, to begin to regenerate and allow growth. Effectiveness: Up to 7 cm of growth has been observed in users within a few months of daily use (two to three hours daily), but the differences are very large relative to the initial size of the penis. There are no known results of use in Slovenia as the device is used mainly in the United States. Side effects: As this is a physical intervention in a sensitive area of the body, it is mandatory to consult a personal physician before any use. Namely, improper use can cause serious problems, including erectile dysfunction. Purchase possibility and price: The device can be verified orderable in Slovenia (postage 19 EUR) on the official website, and the price of the basic model is 189.95 EUR or. EUR 279 with all the extra accessories.
4. Excite Enhancement Gel


Excite Final Gel Rating: 9.6 / 10 PHOTO: Excite Power

Excite Enhancement Gel is a cream that stimulates a faster and more efficient flow of larger amounts of blood into the male genital area immediately after application, providing much larger and harder erections. It is a gel in a bottle that has a spray on top for easy application. The ingredients contained in Excite gel are: water, hydrolyzed collagen, Caprylic-Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Sorbitol, PVP, Alcohol denat., Capsicum Frutescens (extract), Tocopheryl Acetate, squalane, paraffin, Glycereth-26, menthol, Glycery Polyacrylate, Sodium Saccharin, Aroma, Phenoxyethanol, Methy-Ethyl-Propyl-Butylparaben, Acrylates / C 10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Benzyl alcohol, 2-Bromo-2-nitropropane-1, 3-diol, Triethanolamine, BHT, Tetrasodium EDTA , Carbomer. How it works: Gently apply the gel 5 to 15 minutes before intercourse to the penis and massage until completely absorbed. After a minute or two, it begins to work immediately, as the ingredients provide a rapid change in temperature in the penis and thus naturally "persuade" the body to send more blood into it, which is reflected in the easier achievement of erections, which are both larger and harder. Efficiency: It is the only product where results are visible after the first application, so it is preferred over other products that require long-term use. Slovenian users report visible changes, up to 5 cm in length. Excite gel has been reported in various media as the most effective product for enhancing and improving erections. Side effects: No side effects are detected, except in case of severe allergy to any of the ingredients, which can be seen in a slight redness on the skin. Because it is for external use, the product is proven safe and suitable for use without consulting a doctor. Purchase Option and Price: As there are many (less effective) versions of the gel on the market, it is important that the purchase is made on the official website for Slovenia, www.ExcitePovecanje.com, or on the Slovenian order and information number 031 401 302.
5. Penomet vacuum pump


Final Penomet pump rating: 4.2 / 10 PHOTO: Penomet

Penomet Vacuum Pump is the most popular penis enlargement vacuum pump, which, through the pressure created, helps to achieve an erection before sexual intercourse and provides for a larger penis. It is a pump that you put on your penis and push air out of it and take pressure off. Unlike other vacuum pumps, which only operate on air and therefore do not allow for even growth, the Penomet pump is advised to use water that ensures that the pressure on all parts is the same. How it works: Attach a detachable ring to your Penomet pump to fit your penis size. In the shower or in the tub, place the pump on your penis and gently squeeze the air out of it to create pressure. After a while, loosen and repeat the procedure every few minutes for a period of 15-20 minutes. In the end, your penis has an erection that is larger and harder than usual.Effectiveness: Some users report enlargements up to 6 cm, while others use Penomet only to improve erections. Slovenian users have similar experiences as foreign users - most help improve erection, and some also increase sexual intercourse. Side effects: Penomet is also a physical intervention, so you should follow the instructions and consult a personal physician if possible, as improper use can cause erectile dysfunction. Purchase Option and Price: The device can be verified can be ordered to Slovenia from the official website, but will be charged an additional shipping price of $ 30. The price of the Penomet pump is 97 EUR in basic and 227 EUR in premium.
6. Surgical magnification


Final evaluation of surgery: 7.0 / 10 PHOTO: Internet

There are several types of surgery that can help the penis lengthen and enlarge its volume. We checked the most popular way to zoom in with a cutHow does it work: A cosmetic surgeon cuts the ligament that connects the sponge to the pelvis to achieve an extension. The volume of the penis is then increased by adipose tissue, which is absorbed from the patient's abdominal area around the penis. Of course, the surgery must be arranged with official and verified experts. Side Effects: The side effects of surgery are numerous and include infections, nerve damage, decreased sensitivity and erection problems. Perhaps the most annoying and common are the scars that can appear after surgery. The most common side effects of enlargement are the uneven and uneven appearance of the penis. Purchase options: Surgical procedures are performed by various cosmetic surgeons, and the cost of surgery in Slovenia ranges between EUR 1500 and EUR 2000.
A final thought
Among all of these penis enlargement options, we found three clear winners, considering the potential result (efficiency), side effects and final price in the selection. enough user reviews available, our voices go to the X-core and Excite gel. These two methods can help improve erections and affect the size of your penis.


PHOTO: Internet

We must emphasize that all products should be used as directed and that each body responds differently, and results should be monitored. It can help your acquaintance with one product and the other not at all, but this is no guarantee that it will be the same for you. The opposite may be the case with you. However, we can recommend that you first try out products that do not have side effects, because after all, it is about your body and health.
